name: Lost Treasure (KeiryKiri)
description:
You wake up and find yourself stranded in the desert. You search your surroundings and find a magical tomato launcher with an infinite amount of tomatoes and a paper of instructions. The instructions state, “Defeat all the enemies in the area to obtain the treasure at the end.” You always wanted to be Indiana Jones so you embark on this adventure. Along the way, enemies want you to leave their territory. You must find a way to protect yourself and find the treasure...

Collaborated with:

Tony Chen: https://tonybony725.itch.io/

Jack Liu: https://subxeroiq.itch.io/
